name: mundanely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very ordinary and therefore not interesting: The story is interesting, but mundanely written and rather boring to read. more mundanely The money she's saved will be spent on holidays, and, more mundanely, heating the house.
More examplesFewer examplesThe hotel rooms are neat and tidy, with mundanely modern furnishings.The morning started mundanely enough, with no sign of the events that were about to take place.The route he drives to work every day has become mundanely familiar. This rather mundanely titled book answers many fascinating questions.
